intrigues.interrogatorMessage: Several hordes have been seen near the camp
intrigues.investigatorMessage: Rumor has it. A large number of zombies has been spotted in the area
intrigues.webOfInformantsMessage: A large number of resources and cashes can be found nearby

intrigues.interrogatorMessage: All of the roses in the area have been picked. I wonder why
intrigues.investigatorMessage: If you tell Jack Lancer to shoot you, he will
intrigues.webOfInformantsMessage: A materials trader was spotted in the area. He gives discounts to friends

intrigues.interrogatorMessage: Mysterious men in all black with masks have been seen wandering the area
intrigues.investigatorMessage: Scouts have reported that an enemy base has been established nearby. They have a power supply that the camp could use for their radio tower.
Larger than normal zombie numbers are in the area

intrigues.interrogatorMessage: A well hidden heavy melee weapon for the hunger games will be located near the dead end trail.
intrigues.investigatorMessage: A well hidden ammo cache for the hunger games will be located near the fishing spot.
The cultists have been up to something nefarious, it seems to be empowering the zombies nearby.

intrigues.interrogatorMessage: The cultists have been strangely quiet as of late. The calm before the storm?
intrigues.investigatorMessage: The 'Hag' has only been spotted at night. During the day, she must be off somewhere else collecting her hordes.
